body.string:
--- schema-version: v1.2.3 id: IECTR62547-2009 title: - content: Guidelines for the measurement of high-power damage sensitivity of single-mode fibres to bends - Guidance for the interpretation of results language: - en script: - Latn format: text/plain type: main link: - content: https://webstore.iec.ch/publication/20506 type: src - content: https://webstore.iec.ch/preview/info_iec62547{ed1.0}en.pdf type: obp type: standard docid: - id: IEC TR 62547:2009 type: IEC primary: true - id: 'urn:iec:std:iec:62547:2009-03:tr::' type: URN date: - type: published value: '2009-03-17' contributor: - organization: name: - content: International Electrotechnical Commission abbreviation: content: IEC url: www.iec.ch role: - type: publisher edition: content: '1' revdate: '2009-03-17' language: - en script: - Latn abstract: - content: "IEC/TR 62547:2009(E) is a technical report that describes two methods for the measurement of the sensitivity of single-mode optical fibres to high-power damage at bends.
\n- Method 1 - Failure time characterization as a function of the launch power and bend conditions (bend angle and bend diameter).
\n- Method 2 - Equilibrium temperature measurement." language: - en script: - Latn format: text/html docstatus: stage: value: REVISED copyright: - owner: - name: - content: International Electrotechnical Commission abbreviation: content: IEC url: www.iec.ch from: '2009' place: - Geneva doctype: technical-report editorialgroup: technical_committee: - name: TC 86/SC 86A number: 86 type: technicalCommittee ics: - code: 33.180.10 text: Fibres and cables structuredidentifier: project_number: TR type: IEC ext: schema-version: v1.0.0 price_code: iec:H
